0: until nc -vz mysql.dbms 3306; do echo "Waiting for mysql..."; sleep 2; done;
if [ $(curl -s https://am.i.mullvad.net/ip) = '${SECRET_EXT_GATEWAY_IP}' ]; then exit 0; else exit $?; fi

bind = "0.0.0.0"

[[cameras]]
name = "garage"
stream = "both"
username = "neolink"
password = "${CAMERA_GARAGE_PASSWORD}"
address = "${CAMERA_GARAGE_ADDRESS}:9000"
